name: Infinite Clouds
description:
In this game you must avoid all obstacles coming towards you and achieve the highest

score.

Hello this is my first game I decided to make a simple game to start off and make more

complicated games. I want to add more obstacle and boosters like boosters which slow down or speed up spawn rates. I have not decided if I want to yet ..

I made the game in 3 days

Note:

U can see your high score by pausing the game

if enough people want me to update it i will :).

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

C - Crouch

Space - Jump

Escape - Pause
